citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1435 hrs on
03/29/2016. The licensee was on site but busy attending to other (unregulated) animals and was therefore
unavailable until 1630 hrs.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1435 hrs on
03/29/2016.  The licensee was on site but busy attending to other (unregulated) animals and was therefore
unavailable until 1630 hrs.
